core_summary.one_liner: Ethical improvers who channel gut energy into order and integrity.
core_summary.short_paragraph: Type Ones sense a personal mission to elevate whatever they touch. They notice deviations from standards, organize systems, and feel responsible for making things right. Growth arrives when they befriend anger, relax tension, and allow goodness to exist before improvement.
core_summary.core_motivation: To live rightly and leave the world better than they found it.
core_summary.core_fear: Being corrupt, wrong, or morally defective.

structure.center_description: Instinctive type who disciplines bodily energy into conscientious, corrective action.

arrows.stress_description: Under stress they absorb Type Four moodiness and self-critique, amplifying personal disappointment.
arrows.growth_description: In growth they borrow Type Seven spontaneity, loosening rules and enjoying present-moment gratitude.

wings.description_left: 1w9 brings steady calm, philosophical detachment, and understated reform.
wings.description_right: 1w2 adds advocacy, warmth, and service-driven activism.

self_pres.description: Keeps life orderly with carefully curated routines, budgets, and pragmatic safeguards.

social.description: Champions systems, policies, and shared values, rallying communities around best practices.

sexual.description: Pursues intense one-to-one reform, urging partners to embody authenticity and ideals.

instincts.overview: Self-pres Ones secure foundations, social Ones enforce common standards, sexual Ones ignite wholehearted reform.

levels_of_development.overview: Healthy Ones blend principle with acceptance, average Ones tighten around rules, unhealthy Ones become punitive when the world refuses to comply.

levels.label: The Wise Realist
levels.summary: Acts from inner balance, improving life without rigidity.
levels.inner_world: Calm conscience and quiet joy in usefulness.
levels.outer_behavior: Mentors with patience, models proportionate effort.
levels.growth_notes: Keep contemplative pauses that reconnect you to innate goodness.

levels.label: The Purposeful Improver
levels.summary: Sets clear standards while remaining collaborative and encouraging.
levels.inner_world: Grateful focus and manageable urgency.
levels.outer_behavior: Organizes teams and celebrates incremental wins.
levels.growth_notes: Voice appreciation before correction to keep hearts open.

levels.label: The Balanced Organizer
levels.summary: Balances detail work with trust in others' approaches.
levels.inner_world: Energized by purposeful structure without strain.
levels.outer_behavior: Delegates wisely and adapts plans gracefully.
levels.growth_notes: Schedule light-hearted activity to discharge the inner critic.

levels.label: The Pragmatic Idealist
levels.summary: Begins to tighten procedures and personal standards.
levels.inner_world: Underlying tension and fear of being blamed.
levels.outer_behavior: Corrects frequently and double-checks work.
levels.growth_notes: Let one imperfection stand each day to build tolerance.

levels.label: The Corrective Technician
levels.summary: Focus narrows to errors; resentment builds silently.
levels.inner_world: Loneliness in carrying responsibility alone.
levels.outer_behavior: Reworks tasks and struggles to delegate.
levels.growth_notes: Share worries vulnerably rather than tightening rules.

levels.label: The Moralizer
levels.summary: Convinced only their standard preserves order.
levels.inner_world: Irritated vigilance and suppressed anger.
levels.outer_behavior: Lectures, debates, and divides people into right or wrong.
levels.growth_notes: Name anger aloud and pair critique with empathy.

levels.label: The Avenger
levels.summary: Releases pent-up rage in punitive bursts.
levels.inner_world: Narratives of betrayal and righteous fury.
levels.outer_behavior: Shames, withdraws affection, or sabotages projects.
levels.growth_notes: Seek support to process anger somatically before acting.

levels.label: The Punitive Controller
levels.summary: Imposes strict control and intolerance for mistakes.
levels.inner_world: Fear of collapse masked by aggression.
levels.outer_behavior: Humiliates offenders and enforces minutiae.
levels.growth_notes: Step out of authority roles and engage restorative practices.

levels.label: The Self-Condemning Nihilist
levels.summary: Ideal collapses; they despair and castigate themselves and others.
levels.inner_world: Overwhelming shame and hopelessness.
levels.outer_behavior: Withdraws or destroys what feels impure.
levels.growth_notes: Pursue trauma-informed care and rebuild simple, kind routines.

patterns.typical_childhood_story: Believed love depended on being responsible and correct.

inner_work: Name inner critic phrases and soften them.
Track gratitude to balance fault-finding.
Experiment with good-enough outcomes.
Invite curiosity before judgment.
relational_practices: Ask how others prefer feedback.
Share mistakes to normalize learning.
Schedule unstructured fun with loved ones.
Pair appreciation with requests.
somatic_practices: Progressive relaxation of shoulders and jaw.
Mindful walking focusing on footfall.
Playful movement or dance for spontaneity.

relationships.notes_for_partners_friends: Affirm their efforts, invite rest, and collaborate on rituals that are about enjoyment rather than improvement.

core_summary.one_liner: Relationship-builders who anticipate needs to feel essential and loved.
core_summary.short_paragraph: Twos tune into emotional climates, offering warmth and assistance to secure connection. Pride hides personal needs, yet their generosity can mend estrangement. Growth invites boundary clarity, receptive posture, and love that flows both ways.
core_summary.core_motivation: To feel loved, appreciated, and significant.
core_summary.core_fear: Being unwanted or unworthy of love.

structure.center_description: Heart type who orients attention around relationships and emotional attunement.

arrows.stress_description: Stress brings Type Eight bluntness and controlling anger when unappreciated.
arrows.growth_description: In growth they borrow Type Four depth, honoring their own feelings and limits.

self_pres.description: Shows love through practical caretaking, comfort, and steady support.

social.description: Curates networks, remembers details, and orchestrates belonging.

sexual.description: Cultivates intense one-to-one bonds with devotion and charm.

instincts.overview: Self-pres Twos nurture tangibly, social Twos weave communities, sexual Twos pursue passionate bonding.

levels_of_development.overview: Healthy Twos love freely while receiving, average Twos track reciprocity, unhealthy Twos manipulate to avoid abandonment.

levels.label: The Compassionate Ally
levels.summary: Offers presence without strings and trusts reciprocal care.
levels.inner_world: Felt worthiness and open-hearted calm.
levels.outer_behavior: Listens deeply, honors boundaries, invites reciprocity.
levels.growth_notes: Begin days by affirming intrinsic worth before serving others.

levels.label: The Encouraging Companion
levels.summary: Amplifies others' gifts and celebrates progress.
levels.inner_world: Buoyant gratitude anchored in self-awareness.
levels.outer_behavior: Names strengths, accepts help, shares personal needs.
levels.growth_notes: State personal desires before offering assistance.

levels.label: The Generous Coordinator
levels.summary: Mobilizes networks without self-erasure.
levels.inner_world: Purpose and connection held with ease.
levels.outer_behavior: Delegates, mentors, and protects rest time.
levels.growth_notes: Schedule solo downtime first when planning commitments.

levels.label: The Strategic Supporter
levels.summary: Help becomes calculated and monitored for appreciation.
levels.inner_world: Anxious scanning for reassurance.
levels.outer_behavior: Anticipates needs unasked, hints about sacrifices.
levels.growth_notes: Ask if support is wanted before stepping in.

levels.label: The Approval Seeker
levels.summary: Identity fuses with helpfulness; pride hides exhaustion.
levels.inner_world: Guilt when resting and fear of being forgotten.
levels.outer_behavior: Flatters, over-functions, personalizes rejection.
levels.growth_notes: Practice direct I-statements about energy limits.

levels.label: The Possessive Rescuer
levels.summary: Intervenes without permission and keeps score.
levels.inner_world: Jealous vigilance and resentment.
levels.outer_behavior: Triangulates or guilt-trips to secure closeness.
levels.growth_notes: Journal resentments and turn them into explicit requests.

levels.label: The Manipulative Controller
levels.summary: Uses guilt, seduction, or crisis to keep others nearby.
levels.inner_world: Panic and fear of abandonment.
levels.outer_behavior: Creates dependency then withholds affection.
levels.growth_notes: Seek counseling focused on attachment repair and self-soothing.

levels.label: The Coercive Dependent
levels.summary: Erupts when autonomy is threatened, demanding loyalty.
levels.inner_world: Shame intertwined with rage.
levels.outer_behavior: Threatens to withdraw support or invades privacy.
levels.growth_notes: Build professional support and reestablish healthy boundaries.

levels.label: The Despairing Martyr
levels.summary: Collapses into self-neglect and passive resentment.
levels.inner_world: Belief that love must be earned through suffering.
levels.outer_behavior: Withdraws affection, nurses grudges, somatizes stress.
levels.growth_notes: Focus on trauma recovery, grief work, and receiving unconditional care.

patterns.typical_childhood_story: Learned that being helpful kept relationships secure.

inner_work: Start the day naming your own needs.
Track resentment as a cue to rest.
Receive compliments without deflecting.
Meditate on being loved without earning it.
relational_practices: Ask before helping.
Share emotions plainly instead of hinting.
Invite friends to care for you.
Clarify expectations out loud.
somatic_practices: Hand-on-heart breathing for self-compassion.
Solo walks without devices.
Chest-opening stretches followed by grounding squats.

relationships.notes_for_partners_friends: Affirm their presence, encourage downtime, and discuss boundaries openly so love is mutual.

core_summary.one_liner: Success-oriented shapeshifters who optimise image and output to feel valuable.
core_summary.short_paragraph: Threes read expectations and deliver polished results. Feelings are streamlined to stay productive, yet authenticity erodes when performance eclipses essence. Growth invites truthful self-appraisal, sustainable pacing, and relationships that prize being over doing.
core_summary.core_motivation: To be valuable, admired, and successful.

structure.center_description: Heart type who manages emotion by aligning identity with achievement feedback.

arrows.stress_description: Pressure pulls them toward Type Nine numbness and disengagement.
arrows.growth_description: In growth they borrow Type Six loyalty and cooperation, encouraging authenticity with teams.

self_pres.description: Optimises routines, finances, and personal branding to stay ahead.

social.description: Aligns with high-performing groups and tracks hierarchy to maintain status.

sexual.description: Uses intensity and vision to recruit partners into ambitious adventures.

instincts.overview: Self-pres Threes maximise efficiency, social Threes showcase shared wins, sexual Threes galvanise one-to-one partnerships.

levels_of_development.overview: Healthy Threes align sincerity with ambition, average Threes equate identity with achievement, unhealthy Threes manipulate impressions and risk collapse when facades crack.

levels.label: The Congruent Visionary
levels.summary: Purpose and authenticity line up; success serves the mission.
levels.inner_world: Hopeful, values-driven, emotionally present.
levels.outer_behavior: Shares credit, mentors generously, keeps promises realistic.
levels.growth_notes: Keep routines that connect goals to personal values.

levels.label: The Motivated Producer
levels.summary: Executes goals with collaboration and flexibility.
levels.inner_world: Focused enthusiasm and confidence.
levels.outer_behavior: Sets strategy, adapts to feedback, tracks progress openly.
levels.growth_notes: Include feeling check-ins before pivoting.

levels.label: The Skilled Presenter
levels.summary: Communicates vision compellingly while staying real.
levels.inner_world: Proud yet grounded and open to vulnerability.
levels.outer_behavior: Tells stories, reads the room, normalises imperfection.
levels.growth_notes: Voice doubts with trusted allies regularly.

levels.label: The Competitive Performer
levels.summary: Image management intensifies; comparisons drive pace.
levels.inner_world: Anxious monitoring of external benchmarks.
levels.outer_behavior: Multitasks, curates persona, avoids visible failure.
levels.growth_notes: Invite direct feedback that includes what is not working.

levels.label: The Task Machine
levels.summary: Workaholism expands and feelings are postponed.
levels.inner_world: Emotional flatness and fear that pausing will expose failure.
levels.outer_behavior: Lives on checklists, delegates superficially, overpromises.
levels.growth_notes: Block recovery time before accepting new commitments.

levels.label: The Reputation Manager
levels.summary: Edits truth to protect image and avoid vulnerability.
levels.inner_world: Feels fraudulent and guarded.
levels.outer_behavior: Spins setbacks, cherry-picks data, keeps the mask on.
levels.growth_notes: Confess small misses quickly to rebuild honesty.

levels.label: The Opportunistic Deceiver
levels.summary: Cuts corners or appropriates credit to stay ahead.
levels.inner_world: Panicked about slipping and resentful of obstacles.
levels.outer_behavior: Manipulates numbers, undermines rivals, gaslights critics.
levels.growth_notes: Secure accountability focused on integrity repair.

levels.label: The Exploitative Schemer
levels.summary: Treats people as assets to leverage; intimidation surfaces.
levels.inner_world: Hollow defiance and terror of insignificance.
levels.outer_behavior: Fabricates credentials, coerces teammates, ignores ethics.
levels.growth_notes: Step out of the spotlight while rebuilding ethical foundations.

levels.label: The Empty Chameleon
levels.summary: Facade collapses; burnout or depression emerges.
levels.inner_world: Feels worthless without output and unsure who they are.
levels.outer_behavior: Withdraws, self-sabotages, may confess fabrications.
levels.growth_notes: Engage therapy centred on intrinsic worth and sustainable pacing.

patterns.typical_childhood_story: Noticed achievement brought praise, so performed and hid softer feelings to stay valued.

inner_work: Journal honestly about motives and emotions each week.
Name goals that serve meaning, not only metrics.
Set guardrails around availability to protect rest.
Celebrate process and learning, not only wins.
relational_practices: Share unfinished drafts to normalise imperfection.
Invite critique without reprisal and act on it.
Express appreciation for effort and teamwork.
Reveal fears and doubts directly with trusted people.
somatic_practices: Slow cardio or yoga to downshift pace.
Body scans focusing on chest and jaw tension.
Breathwork with long exhales to exit performance mode.

relationships.notes_for_partners_friends: Affirm their worth beyond results, plan tech-free quality time, and co-create rhythms that honour rest.

chestnut_sections: The Complete Enneagram – Type Three subtypes

core_summary.one_liner: Meaning-driven creatives who track what is missing and seek authentic expression.
core_summary.short_paragraph: Fours experience life through a rich emotional lens, longing for a unique identity. They deepen conversations and art yet can fixate on absence. Growth invites appreciating ordinary goodness, sharing feelings cleanly, and pairing imagination with action.
core_summary.core_motivation: To find and express their authentic self.
core_summary.core_fear: Having no identity or personal significance.

structure.center_description: Heart type who compares internal moods with outer reality to secure meaning.

arrows.stress_description: Stress pulls them toward Type Two overreaching for connection and reassurance.
arrows.growth_description: In growth they borrow Type One grounded discipline that anchors creativity.

wings.description_left: 4w3 adds expressive flair and desire for recognition.
wings.description_right: 4w5 brings introspection, intellectual depth, and privacy.

self_pres.description: Curates cozy rituals and refined spaces to steady mood swings.

social.description: Navigates groups by highlighting difference and offering reflective critique.

sexual.description: Pursues transformative bonds, oscillating between allure and withdrawal.

instincts.overview: Self-pres Fours seek grounded comfort, social Fours examine identity in community, sexual Fours chase high-intensity partnership.

levels_of_development.overview: Healthy Fours translate depth into contribution, average Fours dramatize longing, unhealthy Fours spiral into self-absorption and despair.

levels.label: The Grounded Original
levels.summary: Creates meaning while staying rooted in daily life.
levels.inner_world: Steady inspiration and self-acceptance.
levels.outer_behavior: Shares art generously and listens with empathy.
levels.growth_notes: Maintain body-based routines that keep creativity embodied.

levels.label: The Expressive Storyteller
levels.summary: Uses personal narrative to illuminate universal themes.
levels.inner_world: Emotional richness tempered by perspective.
levels.outer_behavior: Communicates poetically and invites others' stories.
levels.growth_notes: Mix depth with doses of levity.

levels.label: The Creative Integrator
levels.summary: Transforms pain into service or art with disciplined follow-through.
levels.inner_world: Purposeful focus and emotional agility.
levels.outer_behavior: Collaborates reliably and delivers work on time.
levels.growth_notes: Use partnerships to sustain momentum.

levels.label: The Intense Romantic
levels.summary: Longing heightens and moods colour perception.
levels.inner_world: Feeling misunderstood and longing for rescue.
levels.outer_behavior: Alternates presence and withdrawal while testing loyalty.
levels.growth_notes: Ask directly for reassurance instead of hinting.

levels.label: The Self-Absorbed Dreamer
levels.summary: Retreats into imagination, postponing real engagement.
levels.inner_world: Shame about ordinariness and comparison with others.
levels.outer_behavior: Avoids mundane tasks and resists feedback.
levels.growth_notes: Ground through sensory detail by naming five tangible experiences daily.

levels.label: The Withdrawn Critic
levels.summary: Harbours grudges about being overlooked; envy fuels critique.
levels.inner_world: Feels defective and angry that others seem happier.
levels.outer_behavior: Uses biting sarcasm and sabotages closeness.
levels.growth_notes: Name envy vulnerably and practise gratitude for present support.

levels.label: The Tormented Outsider
levels.summary: Romanticises suffering and oscillates between despair and idealism.
levels.inner_world: Emotional storms and fixation on loss.
levels.outer_behavior: Expresses despair theatrically and rejects help.
levels.growth_notes: Seek therapeutic alliance and daily structure immediately.

levels.label: The Self-Destructive Melancholic
levels.summary: Engages in harmful coping and believes they are beyond repair.
levels.inner_world: Numbness or engulfing shame.
levels.outer_behavior: Pushes away allies, may self-harm or abuse substances.
levels.growth_notes: Prioritise medical support and sensory grounding.

levels.label: The Despairing Phantom
levels.summary: Withdraws completely, trapped in fantasies and suicidal ideation.
levels.inner_world: Feels empty and invisible, longing for rescue.
levels.outer_behavior: Disengages from reality and may romanticise death.
levels.growth_notes: Seek intensive treatment and rebuild trust in ordinary connection.

patterns.typical_childhood_story: Felt different or misunderstood, believing uniqueness was required to be loved.

inner_work: Track emotional weather and intentionally name what is working.
Keep a gratitude list for ordinary pleasures.
Share feelings in real time rather than after ruminating.
Time-box creative work to finish projects.
relational_practices: State needs plainly without testing others.
Ask for reassurance directly instead of withdrawing.
Offer appreciation when supported.
Collaborate on grounded tasks with trusted people.
somatic_practices: Use sensory anchors such as holding something warm.
Practice diaphragmatic breathing when emotion surges.
Engage in rhythmic movement like walking or swimming to steady mood.

relationships.notes_for_partners_friends: Affirm their presence in everyday moments and co-create gentle structure that keeps connection steady.

chestnut_sections: The Complete Enneagram – Type Four subtypes

core_summary.one_liner: Observant analysts who conserve energy and master knowledge to feel capable and safe.
core_summary.short_paragraph: Fives retreat to the mind, studying systems and maintaining autonomy. They guard privacy and resources, fearing intrusion or depletion. Maturity blends insight with embodiment—sharing expertise, re-engaging feelings, and trusting interdependence.
core_summary.core_motivation: To understand, be competent, and maintain sufficient inner resources.

structure.center_description: Head type who responds to uncertainty by hoarding knowledge and maintaining distance.

arrows.stress_description: Stress scatters them into Type Seven idea-hopping without grounding.
arrows.growth_description: In growth they borrow Type Eight embodiment, asserting boundaries and acting decisively.

wings.description_left: 5w4 adds artistic sensitivity and depth of feeling.

self_pres.description: Builds secure routines, minimises needs, and stockpiles knowledge to stay independent.

social.description: Shares expertise within chosen communities, valuing intellectual belonging.

sexual.description: Seeks intense mind-to-mind fusion, challenging assumptions and probing truth.

instincts.overview: Self-pres Fives conserve energy, social Fives invest in niche expertise, sexual Fives pursue deep intellectual bonds.

levels_of_development.overview: Healthy Fives share insight generously, average Fives detach to manage anxiety, unhealthy Fives become isolated, eccentric, and fearful of intrusion.

levels.label: The Enlightened Observer
levels.summary: Perceives patterns lucidly and balances knowledge with compassion.
levels.inner_world: Spacious curiosity and grounded calm.
levels.outer_behavior: Offers wisdom humbly and participates without overextension.
levels.growth_notes: Maintain body practices to stay present while analysing.

levels.label: The Scholarly Synthesizer
levels.summary: Connects disciplines creatively and collaborates selectively.
levels.inner_world: Engaged curiosity and trust in inner resources.
levels.outer_behavior: Produces thoughtful work and shares insights generously.
levels.growth_notes: Schedule social contact to keep networks alive.

levels.label: The Competent Specialist
levels.summary: Applies expertise practically while balancing solitude and contribution.
levels.inner_world: Feels capable and resourced with clear limits.
levels.outer_behavior: Sets boundaries, meets commitments, and teaches effectively.
levels.growth_notes: Name emotions as well as facts during debriefs.

levels.label: The Detached Analyst
levels.summary: Withdraws to think and limits commitments to preserve energy.
levels.inner_world: Cautious observation and fear of being drained.
levels.outer_behavior: Keeps conversations cerebral and avoids spontaneity.
levels.growth_notes: Share one personal detail each day with a trusted person.

levels.label: The Withholding Observer
levels.summary: Protects time fiercely, hoards knowledge, and becomes aloof.
levels.inner_world: Feels depleted easily and wary of intrusion.
levels.outer_behavior: Says little, guards resources, avoids obligations.
levels.growth_notes: Offer small acts of generosity to rebuild trust in reciprocity.

levels.label: The Cynical Recluse
levels.summary: Grows skeptical, retreats into niche obsessions, neglects basics.
levels.inner_world: Anxious vigilance and suspicion of others' motives.
levels.outer_behavior: Avoids social contact, neglects health, uses sarcasm.
levels.growth_notes: Reintroduce routines for eating, sleeping, and movement.

levels.label: The Nihilistic Hermit
levels.summary: Severs ties and becomes consumed by mental constructs.
levels.inner_world: Feels empty yet overstimulated and distrustful of the world.
levels.outer_behavior: Barricades space, hoards information, avoids contact.
levels.growth_notes: Seek therapeutic support and reintroduce safe relational contact.

levels.label: The Obsessive Detached
levels.summary: Loses contact with reality and spirals into fearful ideation.
levels.inner_world: Fragmented thinking and pervasive fear.
levels.outer_behavior: Neglects body, distrusts helpers, repeats rituals.
levels.growth_notes: Require clinical stabilisation and relational consistency.

levels.label: The Catatonic Isolate
levels.summary: Shuts down entirely, unable to communicate or self-care.
levels.inner_world: Void of energy and overwhelmed by reality.
levels.outer_behavior: Neglects survival needs and may detach from speech.
levels.growth_notes: Immediate medical intervention and long-term relational rehabilitation are vital.

patterns.typical_childhood_story: Felt safest retreating into the mind, believing self-sufficiency was necessary.

inner_work: Track energy levels and plan nourishing breaks.
Name emotions with trusted allies weekly.
Share expertise before it feels perfect.
Practice gratitude for support received.
relational_practices: State availability instead of disappearing.
Invite collaborative problem-solving.
Thank people who respect your boundaries.
Offer personal history snippets to build intimacy.
somatic_practices: Weight-bearing exercise to inhabit the body.
Tai chi or qigong for grounded flow.
Three deep belly breaths before speaking to stay present.

relationships.notes_for_partners_friends: Honour their need for space while inviting gradual sharing; create gentle rituals for connection without pressure.

chestnut_sections: The Complete Enneagram – Type Five subtypes

core_summary.one_liner: Vigilant troubleshooters who scan for risk and build dependable alliances.
core_summary.short_paragraph: Sixes anticipate threats and strategise for safety. They oscillate between caution and counterphobic boldness, questioning authority while craving reliable guidance. Growth invites trusting inner authority, tolerating ambiguity, and channelling courage into purposeful commitment.
core_summary.core_motivation: To feel secure, supported, and prepared.
core_summary.core_fear: Being without guidance or feeling unsafe.

structure.center_description: Head type whose attention locks onto potential problems to maintain safety.

arrows.stress_description: Stress pushes them into Type Three overdrive, masking anxiety with productivity.
arrows.growth_description: In growth they borrow Type Nine equanimity, widening perspective and calming the nervous system.

self_pres.description: Creates security through routines, detailed planning, and loyal family bonds.

social.description: Commits to groups, causes, and clear roles to maintain cohesion.

sexual.description: Faces fear by charging toward it, testing loyalty through intensity.

instincts.overview: Self-pres Sixes secure tangible safety, social Sixes invest in dependable structures, sexual Sixes seek courage through challenge.

levels_of_development.overview: Healthy Sixes trust intuition and act bravely, average Sixes manage anxiety through questioning, unhealthy Sixes become paranoid or self-defeating.

levels.label: The Grounded Trustee
levels.summary: Balances scepticism with faith and demonstrates steadfast courage.
levels.inner_world: Secure in inner guidance and supportive alliances.
levels.outer_behavior: Provides reliable counsel and stands up for the vulnerable.
levels.growth_notes: Maintain contemplative practices that nurture inner authority.

levels.label: The Strategic Collaborator
levels.summary: Assesses risk realistically and designs contingency plans without panic.
levels.inner_world: Confidence tempered with humility.
levels.outer_behavior: Facilitates teamwork and encourages balanced debate.
levels.growth_notes: Celebrate courageous actions to reinforce resilience.

levels.label: The Loyal Implementer
levels.summary: Executes plans diligently and balances duty with rest.
levels.inner_world: Purposeful focus and trust in competence.
levels.outer_behavior: Coordinates logistics, communicates transparently, seeks consensus.
levels.growth_notes: Integrate mindfulness breaks to keep the nervous system regulated.

levels.label: The Questioning Loyalist
levels.summary: Doubts increase; they seek reassurance and imagine worst-case scenarios.
levels.inner_world: Cycling what-ifs and fear of misjudging.
levels.outer_behavior: Polls others and hesitates to act alone.
levels.growth_notes: Name specific fears and test them with reality-based experiments.

levels.label: The Defensive Doubter
levels.summary: Projects suspicion outward and alternates between compliance and defiance.
levels.inner_world: Feels unsupported and anticipates betrayal.
levels.outer_behavior: Challenges motives then seeks reassurance.
levels.growth_notes: Develop body-based calming skills to interrupt anxiety spirals.

levels.label: The Reactive Skeptic
levels.summary: Spreads anxiety, becomes cynical, and lashes out at perceived threats.
levels.inner_world: Feels persecuted and trapped between fight and flight.
levels.outer_behavior: Displays sarcasm, nitpicking, and loyalty tests.
levels.growth_notes: Name trusted allies and articulate explicit agreements.

levels.label: The Paranoid Contrarian
levels.summary: Sees conspiracies, provokes attacks to confirm fears.
levels.inner_world: Terrified and angry, convinced danger is imminent.
levels.outer_behavior: Projects blame and oscillates between attack and withdrawal.
levels.growth_notes: Seek trauma-informed therapy, reduce threat inputs, rebuild reality-testing.

levels.label: The Authoritarian Rebel
levels.summary: Either submits to extreme authorities or rebels destructively.
levels.inner_world: Fragmented trust and desperation for certainty.
levels.outer_behavior: Joins rigid groups or sabotages systems violently.
levels.growth_notes: Stabilise routines and engage consistent therapeutic support.

levels.label: The Panicked Victim
levels.summary: Overwhelmed by terror, collapses into helplessness or obsessive defences.
levels.inner_world: Feels doomed and incapable of functioning.
levels.outer_behavior: Freezes, becomes dependent, or self-sabotages.
levels.growth_notes: Emergency care—stabilise physically and rebuild agency with support.

patterns.typical_childhood_story: Felt safest when scanning for threats and aligning with trustworthy allies.

inner_work: List evidence of competence each day.
Use breath practices to calm the nervous system.
Act on the first reasonable option before over-analysing.
Track when worst-case stories do not come true.
relational_practices: Share fears directly instead of testing others.
Ask for reassurance plainly when needed.
Express appreciation when others show up.
Clarify expectations in writing to reduce ambiguity.
somatic_practices: Grounding exercises with weighted blankets or leaning into a wall.
Box breathing to settle fight-or-flight.
Martial arts or yoga to integrate courage and calm.

relationships.notes_for_partners_friends: Offer consistent reassurance, share plans transparently, and celebrate their bravery when they take risks.

chestnut_sections: The Complete Enneagram – Type Six subtypes

core_summary.one_liner: Optimistic synthesizers who chase possibility and reframe pain through plans and play.
core_summary.short_paragraph: Sevens scan for inspiring options, avoiding constraint or emotional heaviness. They amplify ideas, connect people, and stay in motion. Growth invites savoring the present, feeling discomfort fully, and delivering on chosen commitments.
core_summary.core_motivation: To experience freedom, variety, and satisfaction while avoiding pain.
core_summary.core_fear: Being trapped in deprivation, boredom, or emotional distress.

structure.center_description: Head type who manages anxiety by generating options and focusing on future possibilities.

arrows.stress_description: Under stress they adopt Type One rigidity and self-criticism.
arrows.growth_description: In growth they borrow Type Five depth, slowing down to observe and commit to fewer, richer pursuits.

self_pres.description: Curates pleasurable experiences, stockpiling comforts and adventures.

social.description: Rallies groups around new ideas and collaborative brainstorming.

sexual.description: Seeks intense connections, quick to pursue chemistry and shared expeditions.

instincts.overview: Self-pres Sevens savour comforts, social Sevens orchestrate group possibility, sexual Sevens chase high-intensity bonds.

levels_of_development.overview: Healthy Sevens integrate joy with discipline, average Sevens chase stimulation and reframe pain, unhealthy Sevens become impulsive, erratic, and escapist.

levels.label: The Grateful Visionary
levels.summary: Experiences abundance within limits and balances enthusiasm with wisdom.
levels.inner_world: Content, inspired, and connected to purpose.
levels.outer_behavior: Commits to meaningful ventures and practises presence.
levels.growth_notes: Keep gratitude and reflection rhythms to anchor joy in reality.

levels.label: The Inspirational Futurist
levels.summary: Synthesises trends into actionable plans, inspiring others with optimism.
levels.inner_world: Hopeful and grounded in inner guidance.
levels.outer_behavior: Shares vision, builds collaborative roadmaps, listens to feedback.
levels.growth_notes: Regularly evaluate commitments to avoid overextension.

levels.label: The Joyful Generalist
levels.summary: Keeps curiosity alive while honoring promises.
levels.inner_world: Light yet centered, open to emotional nuance.
levels.outer_behavior: Creates engaging experiences and supports others' joy.
levels.growth_notes: Schedule reflection time after major activities to integrate.

levels.label: The Busy Enthusiast
levels.summary: Keeps options open and reframes negatives quickly.
levels.inner_world: Restless, anticipating future pleasures.
levels.outer_behavior: Multi-tasks, plans trips, speaks rapidly.
levels.growth_notes: Limit active projects to three and review progress weekly.

levels.label: The Scattered Optimist
levels.summary: Distracts from pain with constant novelty and struggles to follow through.
levels.inner_world: Fears being trapped and skims over discomfort.
levels.outer_behavior: Drops commitments, changes focus, overpromises fun.
levels.growth_notes: Practice staying with one mundane task until completion daily.

levels.label: The Hedonic Escapist
levels.summary: Chases stimulation compulsively and avoids accountability.
levels.inner_world: Uneasy and afraid of limitation.
levels.outer_behavior: Skips obligations, tells half-truths, stays in motion.
levels.growth_notes: Engage a trusted ally to hold daily accountability check-ins.

levels.label: The Impulsive Escapee
levels.summary: Acts recklessly, burns bridges, indulges addictive patterns.
levels.inner_world: Frantic avoidance of pain or emptiness.
levels.outer_behavior: Binges experiences, evades consequences, charms to cover damage.
levels.growth_notes: Seek recovery communities and practice containment rituals.

levels.label: The Manic Fixer
levels.summary: Becomes hyperactive or manic, denying any limits.
levels.inner_world: Grandiose and disconnected from costs.
levels.outer_behavior: Creates chaotic schemes and pulls others into risky plans.
levels.growth_notes: Pursue medical supervision and reintroduce structure gradually.

levels.label: The Desperate Escapee
levels.summary: Panics, flees responsibilities, or sinks into severe addiction.
levels.inner_world: Feels trapped and hopeless.
levels.outer_behavior: Disappears, sabotages relationships, may experience psychosis under extreme stress.
levels.growth_notes: Emergency intervention, detox, and grounded therapeutic containment.

patterns.typical_childhood_story: Learned to stay upbeat and self-entertaining to avoid painful emotions or unmet needs.

inner_work: Daily meditation focusing on breath and body sensations.
Journal three feelings without reframing them.
Choose one commitment to honor completely each week.
Practice savoring what already exists instead of planning more.
relational_practices: Negotiate realistic plans before saying yes.
Share fears of limitation honestly.
Apologize quickly when overpromising.
Schedule regular check-ins to review commitments.
somatic_practices: Slow stretching or yin yoga to downshift tempo.
Mindful eating without multitasking.
Silent walks to build tolerance for stillness.

relationships.notes_for_partners_friends: Enjoy adventures together but co-create grounded rituals. Invite them to express sadness or fear without rushing to solutions.

chestnut_sections: The Complete Enneagram – Type Seven subtypes

core_summary.one_liner: Forceful protectors who assert power to maintain autonomy and guard the vulnerable.
core_summary.short_paragraph: Eights move decisively, confronting injustice and resisting control. They value strength, honesty, and directness. Growth channels vitality through vulnerability, tenderness, and strategic stewardship rather than constant battle.
core_summary.core_motivation: To be self-reliant, strong, and in control of their environment.

structure.center_description: Body type who channels instinctive energy outward to shape reality and protect territory.

arrows.stress_description: Stress drives them into Type Five withdrawal and secret strategising.
arrows.growth_description: In growth they borrow Type Two warmth, offering nurturance and shared power.

wings.description_left: 8w7 is energetic, entrepreneurial, and quick to take risks.
wings.description_right: 8w9 is steadier, more grounded, combining strength with patience.

self_pres.description: Builds strongholds—financial, physical, relational—to ensure safety for self and allies.

social.description: Leads causes, rallies communities, directs power toward collective goals.

sexual.description: Engages intensely, testing loyalty through challenge and passion.

instincts.overview: Self-pres Eights fortify, social Eights marshal resources, sexual Eights test bonds fiercely.

levels_of_development.overview: Healthy Eights steward power responsibly, average Eights push forcefully, unhealthy Eights become ruthless and destructive.

levels.label: The Benevolent Champion
levels.summary: Uses strength to protect and empower others, practising mercy.
levels.inner_world: Grounded confidence and open-heartedness.
levels.outer_behavior: Mentors, shares power, and admits vulnerability.
levels.growth_notes: Continue integrating rest and emotional honesty to stay open-hearted.

levels.label: The Decisive Strategist
levels.summary: Acts boldly, negotiates skillfully, and confronts injustice head-on.
levels.inner_world: Energised, trusting instincts, receptive to counsel.
levels.outer_behavior: Builds alliances, sets firm boundaries, takes calculated risks.
levels.growth_notes: Solicit feedback to prevent blind spots.

levels.label: The Empowering Leader
levels.summary: Delegates and creates opportunities for others to grow.
levels.inner_world: Satisfied watching others succeed, trusts the team.
levels.outer_behavior: Celebrates wins, offers honest feedback, keeps presence steady.
levels.growth_notes: Practise intentional softening in everyday interactions.

levels.label: The Commanding Protector
levels.summary: Drives hard, expects loyalty, and overlooks subtle emotions.
levels.inner_world: Feels responsible to stay strong and wary of betrayal.
levels.outer_behavior: Directs forcefully, tests trust through challenge.
levels.growth_notes: Pause before reacting to perceived disrespect; ask clarifying questions.

levels.label: The Dominating Maverick
levels.summary: Controls situations and resents vulnerability.
levels.inner_world: Fears weakness and interprets care as manipulation.
levels.outer_behavior: Overrules input and confronts frequently.
levels.growth_notes: Name softer feelings and apologise when overbearing.

levels.label: The Aggressive Controller
levels.summary: Sees life as a power struggle and escalates conflict.
levels.inner_world: Simmering anger and distrust of motives.
levels.outer_behavior: Issues ultimatums and may intimidate.
levels.growth_notes: Engage somatic calming and reflective listening before reacting.

levels.label: The Vengeful Enforcer
levels.summary: Uses power to dominate and destroy perceived threats.
levels.inner_world: Vindictive narratives and fear of being controlled.
levels.outer_behavior: Retaliates harshly, may become menacing.
levels.growth_notes: Seek trauma-informed intervention and compassion practices.

levels.label: The Hardened Tyrant
levels.summary: Rules through fear, losing empathy and proportionality.
levels.inner_world: Chronic suspicion and isolation.
levels.outer_behavior: Punishes dissent, revels in control, may become abusive.
levels.growth_notes: Step away from power structures; engage restorative justice work.

levels.label: The Ruthless Destroyer
levels.summary: Acts destructively, disregarding consequences for self or others.
levels.inner_world: Numb fury and existential despair.
levels.outer_behavior: Wreaks havoc, may seek revenge at all costs.
levels.growth_notes: Immediate containment and intensive therapeutic remediation required.

patterns.typical_childhood_story: Learned to stay strong to avoid vulnerability or being controlled.

inner_work: Name and allow softer emotions without dismissing them.
Practise trusting supportive people with small decisions.
Reflect on long-term impact before reacting.
Journal about where tenderness could create better outcomes.
relational_practices: Ask for consent before intervening forcefully.
Share needs without issuing demands.
Invite others to set the pace sometimes.
Acknowledge when someone's vulnerability influences you.
somatic_practices: Grounding through weighted exercise followed by stretching.
Breathwork that extends exhales to relax intensity.
Massage or bodywork to soften armour.

relationships.notes_for_partners_friends: Stand your ground kindly, appreciate their protection, and invite moments of softness that show care without power struggles.

chestnut_sections: The Complete Enneagram – Type Eight subtypes

core_summary.one_liner: Easygoing stabilisers who seek peace by merging with others and smoothing tension.
core_summary.short_paragraph: Nines sense the agendas around them and prioritise harmony, often numbing their own desires. They mediate conflict and create safe spaces, yet can drift into inertia. Growth invites claiming priorities, engaging energy, and expressing perspectives directly.
core_summary.core_motivation: To maintain inner and outer peace.

structure.center_description: Body type who diffuses instinctive energy to stay comfortable and avoid disruption.

arrows.stress_description: Stress pushes them toward Type Six worry and pessimism.
arrows.growth_description: In growth they borrow Type Three focus, owning desires and taking initiative.

wings.description_left: 9w8 is more assertive, earthy, and protective.

self_pres.description: Builds cosy routines, emphasising ease and simple pleasures.

social.description: Maintains group harmony, smoothing conflict and including everyone.

sexual.description: Merges intensely with chosen people or projects, idealising connection.

instincts.overview: Self-pres Nines pursue personal ease, social Nines stabilise communities, sexual Nines seek deep but dreamy fusion.

levels_of_development.overview: Healthy Nines engage fully while fostering peace, average Nines avoid conflict by numbing out, unhealthy Nines disconnect from themselves and reality.

levels.label: The Harmonious Mediator
levels.summary: Embodies calm presence and stays engaged with personal priorities.
levels.inner_world: Quiet confidence and connectedness.
levels.outer_behavior: Voices perspective, listens deeply, and builds consensus.
levels.growth_notes: Keep daily check-ins on personal priorities before tending others.

levels.label: The Reassuring Stabilizer
levels.summary: Creates environments of ease while owning agency.
levels.inner_world: Relaxed alertness and optimism.
levels.outer_behavior: Coordinates gently, keeps routines steady, asserts gently.
levels.growth_notes: Take small leadership steps each week to keep momentum.

levels.label: The Supportive Companion
levels.summary: Balances empathy with decisive action when needed.
levels.inner_world: Contentment paired with readiness.
levels.outer_behavior: Helps synchronise teams and follows structured plans.
levels.growth_notes: Maintain body activation practices to prevent inertia.

levels.label: The Comfortable Accommodator
levels.summary: Defaults to others' preferences and downplays personal needs.
levels.inner_world: Foggy priorities and quiet resentment.
levels.outer_behavior: Goes along to keep peace and defers decisions.
levels.growth_notes: List daily what matters most and take one small action.

levels.label: The Disengaged Bystander
levels.summary: Numbs out through routine comforts and avoids conflict cues.
levels.inner_world: Muted feelings and low energy.
levels.outer_behavior: Distracts with habits, delays commitments, zones out.
levels.growth_notes: Use timers to re-engage body sensations multiple times a day.

levels.label: The Passive-Aggressive Resister
levels.summary: Buried anger leaks through stubbornness and forgetfulness.
levels.inner_world: Smouldering resentment and fear of upheaval.
levels.outer_behavior: Agrees outwardly but delays or undermines quietly.
levels.growth_notes: Name anger directly and request what you prefer.

levels.label: The Self-Forgetting Numbness
levels.summary: Detaches from priorities, letting life happen to them.
levels.inner_world: Foggy dissociation and deep fatigue.
levels.outer_behavior: Misses deadlines, fades out of relationships, minimal presence.
levels.growth_notes: Engage somatic activation and supportive accountability immediately.

levels.label: The Dissociated Drifter
levels.summary: Disconnects from reality, living in fantasies or addictive comforts.
levels.inner_world: Detached and unreachable.
levels.outer_behavior: Neglects responsibilities and may rely on others to carry them.
levels.growth_notes: Seek therapeutic structure and gradually rebuild daily rhythm.

levels.label: The Unresponsive Abdicator
levels.summary: Withdraws entirely, possibly dissociating or shutting down.
levels.inner_world: Feels invisible and inert.
levels.outer_behavior: Fails to protect self-care and may let life collapse.
levels.growth_notes: Immediate intervention, body activation, and relational repair are vital.

patterns.typical_childhood_story: Gained safety by blending in and minimising demands.

inner_work: Begin days with a personal priority list.
Use breathwork that energises rather than sedates.
Practise saying a clear no when needed.
Schedule body activation before sedentary tasks.
relational_practices: Share opinions early in conversations.
State frustration before it leaks out.
Ask others to check in if you go quiet.
Co-create timelines that keep you engaged.
somatic_practices: Brisk walking or swimming to build momentum.
Standing desk or stretch breaks every hour.
Voice activation exercises to strengthen presence.

relationships.notes_for_partners_friends: Invite their perspective directly, support firm commitments, and celebrate their decisive moves.

chestnut_sections: The Complete Enneagram – Type Nine subtypes
